title: runtime: TestLFStackStress failure
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=5069dab9a8255a63388ecace012349d4eb8a5011

has triggered failures across many unrelated 386 builders

# GOMAXPROCS=2 runtime -cpu=1,2,4
--- FAIL: TestLFStackStress (0.00 seconds)
	lfstack_test.go:125: Wrong number of nodes 77/100
FAIL
FAIL	runtime	76.298s

Please use labels and text to provide additional information.

http://build.golang.org/log/916e4a436f5c735afd873bcb10b7a9766d9640a5
http://build.golang.org/log/2fa5a8d247bed83b00951f347e7896a7db8a0e24
http://build.golang.org/log/4f0aabdd6e06911ec72a346526ff63161a251968
http://build.golang.org/log/062d09c7f36704b580e88d3561fd7f03d791f2aa
